entry.tran: 一夫一妻制的;有单一性伴侣的
entry.def: Someone who is monogamous or who has a monogamous relationship has a sexual relationship with only one partner.

example.ex: Do you believe that men are not naturally monogamous?...
example.tran: 你相信人类并非本来就是一夫一妻制的吗？

example.ex: She wouldn't want to be in a monogamous relationship.
example.tran: 她不想要单一性伴侣的关系。

entry.def: Monogamous animals have only one sexual partner during their lives or during each mating season.

means.word_mean: 1. (used of relationships and of individuals) having one mate;
